eegdash.dataset.DS004018
========================

EEG recordings for 200 object images presented in RSVP sequences at 5Hz or 20Hz (OpenNeuro ``ds004018``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: eeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 16` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 32` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Grootswagers, T., Robinson, A.K., Carlson, T.A.

     - `doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds004018.v2.0.0 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds004018.v2.0.0>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds004018>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds004018>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS004018

   dataset = DS004018(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004018(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004018(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
